description:
Tactimon arrives in the Magma Zone and tells Taiki a shocking story of Dorulumon`s past: he used to be a prodigal warrior in the Bagra Army who conquered many Zones as Tactimon`s right hand man! He calls Dorulumon a traitor, but Taiki still chooses to trust him. They eventually escape from their cage and face AncientVolcamon, who has grown even stronger after absorbing his own allies. Dorulumon and Shoutmon DigiXros to fight him and try to return peace to the Magma Zone for good!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドルルモン, 風に駆ける!
